actions.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.J. Res. 660 with 1 hour 0 of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions except motion to recommit. Measure will be considered read. Bill is closed to amendments. The amendment printed in section 2 of H. Res. 492 shall be considered as having been agreed to. No other amendments to the joint resolution may be offered unless the Floor Manager yields for such a purpose.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-797, by Mr. Moakley.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 176.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 660) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1991, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 660 (continuing appropriations).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 660) making further continuing appropriations for the fiscal year 1991, and for other purposes.
